oshiSkill.name: イエローマイク ("Yellow Mic")
oshiSkill.description: [Once per turn] If your Center holomem is Yellow, their Arts gain +20 power until the end of this turn.

spOshiSkill.name: 後は引き受けた！ ("I'll take care of the rest!")
spOshiSkill.description: [Once per game] ) Switch your Center holomem with one of your Back holomems who is not Resting. Then restore 30 HP to the holomem that moved to the Back Position.

name: Shiranui Flare
extraEffect: You may include any number of this holomem in your deck.

name: Shiranui Flare
collabEffect: 大切な仲間たちと: If there are 5 or fewer holomems on your Stage, you may reveal a Debut <Omaru Polka>, <Sakura Miko>, <Hoshimachi Suisei>, or <Shirogane Noel> from your Deck and put it onto your Stage. Then shuffle your deck.

skills.name: キミといっしょにお出かけ
ワンダフルライフ
skills.description: If you have fewer cards in hand than your opponent, this Art gains +10 power.

name: Shiranui Flare
bloomEffect: エルフレンドのさえずり: Reveal 1 <Elfriend> from your deck and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

skills.name: キミを1番好きなのはわたしぃ～♡
skills.description: If you have 3 or less LIFE, this Art gains +30 power.

skills.name: ありあとりゃあすっ
skills.description: If you have 3 or more Holomems with different card names with #ReGLOSS on your stage, this arts gains +20.

name: Shiranui Flare
bloomEffect: また一つ成長した私を　 : [Back position only] If your collab holomem has 70 of less HP remaining, you may Switch this holomem with your Collab holomem.

name: Shiranui Flare

skills.name: エルフレパーティー
skills.description: You may attach 1 Elfriend from your Archive to this holomem.

extraEffect: When this holomem is downed, your life is reduced by 2.

name: Shiranui Flare
giftEffect: 疲れ知らず : [Center position only] Whenever this holomem takes damage, it takes -10 damage.

skills.name: 情熱ステージ
skills.description: If you have 3 or less LIFE, this Art gains +70 power.

name: Shirogane Noel
collabEffect: 大物の確証: Your Center holomem's Arts gain +10 power until the end of this turn.

skills.name: いっぱい建築したいです

name: Sakura Miko
collabEffect: バーニン♪ バーニン♪: Deal 10 special damage to your opponent's Center holomem.

skills.name: 魔王軍は無くなりました

name: Omaru Polka
collabEffect: 僕らに水を: If your Center holomem is Shiranui Flare and you have fewer cards in hand than your opponent, draw 1 card from your Deck.

name: Hoshimachi Suisei
collabEffect: 飯が底をつきそう……:If your Center holomem is Shiranui Flare, you may send 1 Cheer from your Archive to any of your holomems other than this one.

skills.name: 任せて雇ってください‼

name: Shiranui Constructions
ability: This card can only be played if you have 6 or fewer cards in your hand, excluding this card. Look at the top four cards of your Deck. Reveal any number of them that are holomems named <Shiranui Flare>, <Omaru Polka>, <Sakura Miko>, <Hoshimachi Suisei>, or <Shirogane Noel> and put them into your hand. Then put the remaining cards on the bottom of your Deck in any order.

name: Elfriend
ability: The holomem with this Fan attached has +10 HP. This Fan may only be attached to your Shiranui Flare, and you may attach any number of this Fan to one holomem.
